languages.text: {n}Дознаватель взирает на орудие Хаоса несколько мгновений.{/n} "Ты опасно приблизил{mf|ся|ась} к черте, что отделяет радикальные взгляды от открытой ереси. Будь осторожнее в своих экспериментах, {name}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Дознаватель взирает на орудие Хаоса несколько мгновений.{/n} "Ты опасно приблизил{mf|ся|ась} к черте, что отделяет радикальные взгляды от открытой ереси. Будь осторожнее в своих экспериментах, {name}".

languages.text: {n}The Interrogator looks at the Daemon Engine for a few moments.{/n} "You have stepped dangerously close to the line that separates radical thinking from indisputable heresy. Be more prudent in your experiments, {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Дознаватель взирает на орудие Хаоса несколько мгновений.{/n} "Ты опасно приблизил{mf|ся|ась} к черте, что отделяет радикальные взгляды от открытой ереси. Будь осторожнее в своих экспериментах, {name}".

traits.locale_text: {n}The Interrogator looks at the Chaos construct for a few moments.{/n} "You have stepped dangerously close to the line that separates radical thinking from indisputable heresy. Be more prudent in your experiments, {name}."

{n}The Interrogator looks at the Chaos construct for a few moments.{/n} "You have stepped dangerously close to the line that separates radical thinking from indisputable heresy. Be more prudent in your experiments, {name}."

{n}The Interrogator looks at the Chaos engine for a few moments.{/n} "You have stepped dangerously close to the line that separates radical thinking from indisputable heresy. Be more prudent in your experiments, {name}."

{n}The Interrogator looks at the Chaos engine for a few moments.{/n} "You have stepped dangerously close to the line that separates radical thinking from indisputable heresy. Be more prudent in your experiments, {name}."

{n}The Interrogator looks at the Daemon Engine for a few moments.{/n} "You have stepped dangerously close to the line that separates radical thinking from indisputable heresy. Be more prudent in your experiments, {name}."

languages.text: {n}インテロゲイターは魔導兵器を数秒間見つめた。{/n}「陛下は過激な思想と明白な異端とを分ける境界線に危険なほど近づいています。実験にはもっと慎重に取り組んでください、{name}さん」
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator looks at the Daemon Engine for a few moments.{/n} "You have stepped dangerously close to the line that separates radical thinking from indisputable heresy. Be more prudent in your experiments, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}インテロゲイターは魔導兵器を数秒間見つめた。{/n}「陛下は過激な思想と明白な異端とを分ける境界線に危険なほど近づいています。実験にはもっと慎重に取り組んでください、{name}さん」

languages.text: {n}L'interrogateur observe la machine-démon durant quelques instants.{/n} « Vous vous approchez dangereusement de la frontière qui sépare la pensée radicale et l'hérésie pure et simple. Faites preuve de prudence lors de vos expériences, {name}. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator looks at the Daemon Engine for a few moments.{/n} "You have stepped dangerously close to the line that separates radical thinking from indisputable heresy. Be more prudent in your experiments, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'interrogateur observe la machine du Chaos durant quelques instants.{/n} « Vous vous approchez dangereusement de la frontière qui sépare la pensée radicale et l'hérésie pure et simple. Faites preuve de prudence lors de vos expériences, {name}. »

languages.text: {n}海因里希看着这台恶魔引擎，沉默半晌。{/n}“激进的思想与不容置疑的异端行为之间有一条红线，而你离那条红线越来越近。你的实验必须更加谨慎才是，{name}。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator looks at the Daemon Engine for a few moments.{/n} "You have stepped dangerously close to the line that separates radical thinking from indisputable heresy. Be more prudent in your experiments, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希看着这台混沌机械，沉默半晌。{/n}“激进的思想与不容置疑的异端行为之间有一条红线，而你离那条红线越来越近。你的实验必须更加谨慎才是，{name}。”

languages.text: {n}El interrogador mira el ingenio daemónico durante unos instantes.{/n} «Se encuentra en la peligrosa línea que separa el pensamiento radical de la herejía incontestable. Sea más prudente con sus experimentos, {name}».
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator looks at the Daemon Engine for a few moments.{/n} "You have stepped dangerously close to the line that separates radical thinking from indisputable heresy. Be more prudent in your experiments, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}El interrogador mira el motor del Caos durante unos instantes.{/n} «Se encuentra en la peligrosa línea que separa el pensamiento radical de la herejía incontestable. Sea más prudente con sus experimentos, {name}».

languages.text: {n}Der Interrogator sieht sich die Dämonenmaschine einen Augenblick lang an.{/n} "Ihr seid gefährlich nah an eine Grenze herangetreten, die radikales Denken von unbestreitbarer Ketzerei trennt. Seid in Euren Experimenten umsichtiger, {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator looks at the Daemon Engine for a few moments.{/n} "You have stepped dangerously close to the line that separates radical thinking from indisputable heresy. Be more prudent in your experiments, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Interrogator sieht sich die Chaosmaschine einen Augenblick lang an.{/n} "Ihr seid gefährlich nah an eine Grenze herangetreten, die radikales Denken von unbestreitbarer Ketzerei trennt. Seid in Euren Experimenten umsichtiger, {name}."

languages.text: {n}Sorgucu, birkaç saniye boyunca İblis Motoru'na bakıyor.{/n} "Mantıklı düşünme yetisi ile mutlak sapkınlık arasında ince bir çizgi vardır. Sınırda geziniyorsun. Deneylerin konusunda daha ihtiyatlı davranmanı öneririm {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}The Interrogator looks at the Daemon Engine for a few moments.{/n} "You have stepped dangerously close to the line that separates radical thinking from indisputable heresy. Be more prudent in your experiments, {name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sorgucu, birkaç saniye boyunca İblis Motoruna bakıyor.{/n} "Mantıklı düşünme yetisi ve mutlak sapkınlık arasında ince bir çizgi var, sınırda geziniyorsun. Deneylerin konusunda daha ihtiyatlı davranmanı öneririm {name}."
